title: [Large-Scale] Cognitive Load Management Strategies in Simulation-Based Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Practical language proficiency and foundational simulation-based education experience
context.additional_context: Language training course utilizing real-time collaboration tools and simulation software in a BYOD environment. Learners perform simulation tasks reflecting real workplace scenarios and undergo project-based assessment

learning_goals: Identification and measurement of three or more types of cognitive load generated in simulation environments.
Presentation of two or more simulation design strategies that minimize emotional anxiety factors.
Achievement of 80% or higher completion rates for simulation tasks by applying personalized cognitive load management techniques.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
